entry.title: Russian Drone Strikes Leave Most of Odessa Without Power
entry.content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said 1.5 million people in the region were without power, with only critical infrastructure connected to the power grid.

entry.title: Putin's Propaganda Chief Urges 'War Over People's Minds' on Russia's Home Front
entry.content: In a speech revealing Kremlin efforts to bolster domestic support for its war in Ukraine, Sergei Kiriyenko told state officials they are “special forces” fighting an information war.

entry.title: How U.S. Negotiators Secured Brittney Griner's Release
entry.content: Months of dragged-out talks led to a final frenetic few weeks that ended in freeing the two-time Olympic gold medalist.
